General.Name: Canada Jetlines Operations Ltd
General.Description: Canada Jetlines Operations Ltd engages in the carrier airline business. The company operates flights within Canada and to destinations in the United States, Mexico, and the Caribbean. It also uses its fleet to provide corporate customers and brokers charter services, as well as aircraft, crew, maintenance, and insurance services. The company is headquartered in Mississauga, Canada.
General.Address: 1055 West Georgia Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6E 3P3

1.Name: Mr. Brad  Warren
1.Title: COO & VP of Maintenance of Canada Jetlines
